nodes.text: Saeduree River Shipping was a shipping company based on Kinyen that was founded thousands of years before the Galactic Civil War. While most of the planet's businesses were nationalized by Kinyen's socialist government, Saeduree River Shipping was allowed to remain semi-private and was given exclusive shipping rights for much of Capra's continent. The company shared its name with one of Kinyen's  rivers.
Saeduree River Shipping was mentioned in the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying Game expansion Strongholds of Resistance, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games.
